title: Basics of iOS App Development
headline: Learn to develop and publish mobile applications on Apple's iOS platform in this free online course.
description: Mobile applications are an integral part of the mobile experience and are the most popular channel for accessing the internet. Apps on Apple's iOS have proven to be the most profitable of all mobile platforms. However, designing and publishing them on the platform can be daunting and discouraging. In this course, you will learn the entire process of developing and testing iOS apps and publishing them on the App Store.

courseDescription:
Almost all internet interactions on mobile occur by using apps and more people are accessing the internet utilising this method than ever before. As a result, more and more mobile apps are being developed and published daily. Despite being a minority in the mobile market, applications published on Apple’s iOS platform earn more revenue than competing platforms. However, this comes with a challenge for developers as they must navigate proprietary services, software and numerous rules before submitting their apps for approval.

This course will take you through the entire process that you must follow to successfully develop an iOS app and publish it on the App Store. You will first learn to register as an Apple developer, a prerequisite for publishing apps on the platform and the process for setting up an app development project. Next, you will learn to add and modify essential user interface elements like labels, buttons, sliders and text fields. Finally, you will also discover the process for incorporating alarms and reminders into your app.

Then you will learn how objects like the tab bar and navigation controller can add and connect views in your application. Explore social media integration and discover how to post directly from your application on social media. Study the important development aspects like working with databases, servers and iCloud in detail and expose you to the crucial process of publishing and managing your app on the App Store. Start today and learn to develop and publish iOS apps from start to finish in under four hours!

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.name: Module
modules.details: Introduction and Building the User Interface
modules.description: In this module, you will be introduced to the tools needed for App development for the iOS platform as well as important prerequisites like the Apple Developer registration. You will also learn to set up a project and use various controls to build the user interface of your iOS application.
topics: Introduction and Building the User Interface – Learning Outcomes
Progress View, Page Controls, User Alerts and Messages
Introduction and Building the User Interface – Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: Table and collection views organise content into lists and grids and are used in a lot of iOS applications. In this module, you will learn to create and modify table views, and add indexes for easy navigation. You will also learn to add and connect pages in your app, and how to create alerts, incorporate web content and pass data across pages.
topics: Table View, Navigation and Controls –Learning Outcomes
Tab Bar Controller, Alerts and Messages
Table View, Navigation and Controls –Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.details: iOS Features and Working with Data
modules.description: In this module, you will learn to use important features that involve location and data. You will learn about geocoding, reverse geocoding, and getting a user's location. You will also learn to post on Twitter and Facebook, directly from your app. Finally you will learn to work with JSON, SQLite, iCloud and how to publish your app on the App Store.
topics: iOS Features and Working with Data – Learning Outcomes
iOS Features and Working with Location
iOS Features and Working with Data – Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
topics: Fundamentals of iOS App Development – Course assessment
